attributes.action: rule out a Titon-style Prison in Warrington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following a consultation on large Titon-style prisons in the summer, Warrington has been suggested as a potential site for such a prison, which will contain 2,500 inmates. This will be placed on the Omega site, orignally designated as a business park. This will effectively kill of Omega as a business centre. In addition, current transport infrastructure around the site is inadequae and could not sustain a prison of this size. We therefore call on the PM to rule out such a prison on this site.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
